00036 const int
00037 ChemicalElementInterface::naturalNucleonNr() 
00038 {
00039         return -1;
00040 }

00048 {

00053 ChemicalElementInterface::setSymbol(const std::string& s)

00058 int
00059 ChemicalElementInterface::nucleons(void) const 
00060 {
00061         return doNucleons();

00063 
00064 void
00065 ChemicalElementInterface::setNucleons(int i) 
00066 {
00067         if (i <= 0) i = naturalNucleonNr();
00068         doSetNucleons(i);
00069 }

00071 bool
00072 ChemicalElementInterface::isIsotope(void) const 
00073 {
00074         return nucleons() != naturalNucleonNr();
00075 }

00094 
00095 bool
00096 ChemicalElementInterface::operator<(const ChemicalElementInterface& e) const
00097 {
00098         int cmp = symbol().compare(e.symbol());
00099         if (cmp == 0) {
00100                 return nucleons() < e.nucleons();
00101         }
00102         return cmp < 0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 ChemicalElementInterface&
00106 ChemicalElementInterface::operator=(const ChemicalElementInterface& e)
00107 {
00108         if (this != &e) {
00109                 setSymbol(e.symbol());
00110                 setNucleons(e.nucleons());
00111         }
00112         return *this;
00113 }
00114 
00115 std::string
00116 ChemicalElementInterface::doUniqueName(void) const
00117 {
00118         return ChemicalElementInterface::doToString();
00119 }
00120 
00121 std::string
00122 ChemicalElementInterface::doToString(void) const
00123 {
00124         std::stringstream ss;
00125         if (isIsotope())
00126                 ss << nucleons();
00127         ss << symbol();
00128         return ss.str();
00129 }
00130 
00131 std::string
00132 ChemicalElementInterface::doToMarkup(void) const
00133 {
00134         std::stringstream ss;
00135         if (isIsotope()) 
00136                 ss << "<sup>" << nucleons() << "</sup>";
00137         ss << symbol();
00138         return ss.str();
00139 }

00148 CompoundElementInterface::setCoefficient(double c)
00149 {
00150         doSetCoefficient(c);

00153 double
00154 CompoundElementInterface::coefficient(void) const 
00155 {
00156         return doCoefficient();
00157 }
00158 
00159 CompoundElementInterface&
00160 CompoundElementInterface::operator=(const CompoundElementInterface& e) 
00161 {
00162         if (this != &e) {
00163                 ChemicalElementInterface::operator=(e);
00164                 setCoefficient(e.coefficient());
00165         }
00166         return *this;
00167 }
00168 
00169 std::string
00170 CompoundElementInterface::doToString(void) const
00171 {
00172         std::stringstream ss;
00173         if (isIsotope()) ss << "(";
00174         ss << ChemicalElementInterface::doToString();
00175         if (isIsotope()) ss << ")";
00176         if (coefficient() != 1.0) ss << coefficient();
00177         return ss.str();
00178 }
00179 
00180 std::string
00181 CompoundElementInterface::doToMarkup(void) const
00182 {
00183         std::stringstream ss;
00184         ss << ChemicalElementInterface::doToMarkup();
00185         if (coefficient() != 1.0) ss << "<sub>" << coefficient() << "</sub>";
00186         return ss.str();
00187 }

00209 ChemicalElement::~ChemicalElement()

00212         mD = NULL;

00374 
00375 std::string 
00376 cfp::toMarkup(const cfp::Compound& el)
00377 {
00378         std::string str;
00379         Compound::const_iterator it = el.begin();
00380         while(it != el.end())
00381         {
00382                 str.append(it->toMarkup());
00383                 it++;
00384                 if (it != el.end()) str.append(" ");
00385         }
00386         return str;
00387 }
00388 
00389 std::string 
00390 cfp::toString(const cfp::Compound& el)
00391 {
00392         std::stringstream ss;
00393         ss << el;
00394         return ss.str();
00395 }

00401         return o;

00404 std::ostream& 
00405 std::operator<<(std::ostream& o, const Compound& el)
00406 {
00407         Compound::const_iterator it = el.begin();
00408         while(it != el.end())
00409         {
00410                 o << it->toString();
00411                 it++;
00412                 if (it != el.end()) o << " ";
00413         }
00414         return o;
00415 }
